duties_responsibilities.duty: Unpack bulk glass vials from vendors and tray them into plastic trays for inspection and filling using Dabrico turntable.
Maintain a safe and secure working environment following all safety procedures, including minor and major cleaning of vial traying room.

Support the Fulfillment and Distribution of clinical and commercial finished goods to global regions through pick, pack, and ship activities, including receiving incoming materials and performing inventory cycle counts.
Operate machinery for routine physical handling of inventory, including forklift and pallet operations.
Interact with upstream suppliers and downstream customers, building and maintaining effective communication and relationships to support the operation.
Adapt to change and remain flexible in the role and department.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/GED with Forklift and Material Handling Equipment (MHE) Certification, Safety and Task Training Certifications, and Respirator Qualification.
